turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am thirsty. I would like to have a coffee from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok which Starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick up my coffee from the Starbucks on Grindstone Parkway

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, the Starbucks Location on Grindstone Parkway in Columbia, MO

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes that is correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like for me to order for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to try the Iced Starbucks Blonde Black and White Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the biggest one available

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok that would be a Venti, what type of milk would you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like almond milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and would you like whipped cream or any other toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I am going to order a Venti Blonde Black and White Mocha with almond milk and whipped cream

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct, oh and can you have them add an extra pump of white mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I can do that, do you have any other special requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is all

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I have a Venti Blonde Black and White Mocha with almond milk and whipped cream and an extra pump of white mocha

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I will order that for you at the Starbucks on Grindstone Parkway in Columbia, MO

items.name: Iced Starbucks Blonde Black and White Mocha
